stories.text:
Hi HN and YC people! We are launching the first open beta of Substicy for external users.

Have you ever thought about subscribing to that substack's cool newsletter, but then a thought crossed your mind: "My inbox is a mess, I'll never read it". Yes, we know how you feel. Let us say you got over that hurdle and subscribed to the newsletter anyway. It's 3 pm, you are busy with an important task and you receive this great email with lots of information you are dying to read. Cool, but you are not going to read it now because you are in the middle of that important task, remember? Then it's too late. Another 300 emails in your inbox.

We got you! Substicy lets you manage, discover, subscribe to, and consume newsletters - all in one place.

- You get an exclusive Substicy email that lets you receive all the newsletters you prefer.

- Several newsletters are already included in the app that you can subscribe to with just one tap - subscribe to them all!

- Favorite your newsletters to read them later.

- Read Offline (soon).

We are in the pre-launch phase and we need every single feedback to make the best Substicy ever. If you like the newsletter market and want to network with great people and help us build the next big thing in content creation, join us now!!!

https://substicy.com
